T02TD2607E:80b-1: badzra bhee ra ba s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02TD2607E:80b-3: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD2607E:80b-4: 'jam dpa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2607E:80b-5: rab tu khros shing gdug pa 'dul //
T02TD2607E:80b-6: ma lus log pa'i bdud 'dul ba //
T02TD2607E:80b-7: zhal dang phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin //
T02TD2607E:80b-8: ma he'i zhal la phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2607E:80b-9: de yi sgrub pa'i rim pa zhig / bdag gis dran nas brtsam par bya //
T02TD2607E:80b-10: dang por yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdag nyid khrus byas te stan bde ba la 'dug nas /
T02TD2607E:80b-11: aom badzra bhee ra wa dzva la dzva la h'um /
T02TD2607E:80b-13: bla ma dkon mchog la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2607E:80b-14: aom aa bh'a ba sba bh'a ba bi shuddha badzra tsakshu aa a'a aam aa:/
T02TD2607E:80b-15: zhes bya bas stong pa nyid bsgom mo //
T02TD2607E:80b-16: de nas bdag nyid yi ge aar gnas pa las de'i 'od zer gyis tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang /
T02TD2607E:81a-0: nyi zla'i steng du aa zhu ba @81a * //
T02TD2607E:81a-1: autpala 'khor los mtshan pa de zhu ba las bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing nag g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na autpala 'dzin pa /
T02TD2607E:81a-2: gzhon nu'i cha lugs la rgyan gyis brgyan par bsam mo //
T02TD2607E:81a-3: de'i thugs kan nyi ma la h'um gnas pa can du bsams te /
T02TD2607E:81a-4: h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad par byung bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchod //
T02TD2607E:81a-6: zhe sdang gi skur gyur pa ni //
T02TD2607E:81a-7: zhal drug phyag rnam pa drug dang ldan pa /
T02TD2607E:81a-10: sku mdog mthing nag / mi mgo brgya'i do shal can /
T02TD2607E:81a-11: zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa /
T02TD2607E:81a-12: phyag drug g-yas g-yon gyi dang po keng rus kyi dbyug pa dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2607E:81a-13: g-yas g-yon gyi bar pa na mda' gzhu dang ral gri /
T02TD2607E:81a-14: tha ma na sna tshogs rdo rje dang mdung bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2607E:81a-15: de las tshad med pa bzhi'i khro bo 'phro ba can no //
T02TD2607E:81a-16: zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa bsgom /
T02TD2607E:81a-17: de'i thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du h'um bsams la /
T02TD2607E:81a-18: spyan drangs pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang gsang sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02TD2607E:81a-19: aom hr'i: sht'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um /
T02TD2607E:81a-21: aom du: kha tstshe da h'um h'um /
T02TD2607E:81a-23: de nas mtshan gyi sgo nas bstod do //
T02TD2607E:81a-24: gtor ma btang nas gshegs su gsol te ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2607E:81a-25: bdag gis dge ba 'di byas pas //
T02TD2607E:81a-26: bla med byang chub thob par shog / rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon aa shva ka shr'is mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2607E:81a-28: // / pandi ta dharma shr'i mi tra dang /
T02TD2607E:81a-29: lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
